data.message: Myself and daughter Amber have entered many codes and no email to either of us. Hopefully we are in the game.

replies.message: Hi Claire, thanks for getting in touch. Each time you've entered your codes, you should have received an on-screen message to confirm that you were in the running to win a dream holiday. All winning entrants have been sent an email within 24 hours, to the email address they provided at the point of entry. The main promotion has now ended, but you still have the chance to win a dream holiday, as there will be a bonus draw on 30/09/17. Thanks
